title: Awards Season Has Gone Cuckoo. Plus: The 10 Best Movies at Sundance.
description:
Stonks, SAG Awards, and streamers: Amanda and Sean break down a roller coaster of a week in the movie business (0:36). Then, they’re joined by Adam Nayman to discuss a virtual Sundance Film Festival, the big acquisitions, and the very best films that just might be coming to a streamer near you (30:30).

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Adam Nayman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
